title: BLACK+DECKER EM044KB19 Over The Range Microwave Oven with One Touch, 1000 Watts, 400 CFM and Sensor Cooking, OTR 1.9 Cu.ft
description: This stylish Black + Decker 1.9 cubic foot 1000 watt over-the-range microwave oven features with 10 power levels, two-speed 400 CFM venting system and 13.5” turntable. The one touch cook feature pre-sets the power and time for different food, including popcorn, potato, vegetable, pizza, snack, bacon, frozen dinner, rice, and frozen breakfast, all you need to do is to select the food and weight. A rack for 2-level cooking/reheating is provided in the box so that you can cook more food in one time. The turntable function can be turned off when you need to cook large dishes.
